Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2010 12:01AM Luv9483 wrote: Big hugs to you "VRamos" and to you "Whodatehot" It's the scariest thing hearing the "C" word. My mom was dx the monday before thanksgiving. It was the worst day of my life.  She has since had a lumpectomy and 6 weeks of rads (she just finished last week). She was a trooper (I took it worse than she did!). The good news is that the worst part is over. Waiting to hear the dreaded words and find out all the details is the worst.  Try to stay strong!
Posts.Title: Newly Diagnosed & Overwhelmed VRamos Denise2287
